Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 93rd overall pick, by Oakland in 1972...
Injured on 8/12/1973 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 8/28/1973 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Released by Oakland on 4/1/1975...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1977 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 6/8/1978 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 5/26/1980 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/1980 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/2/1981, off Nestor Chavez (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/7/1981, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
